# Tender Announcement: EF236-232036-2 Roofing Replacement

## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of Correctional Services Canada, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to contract for the rehabilitation of Building 2 at the CFF 6099 Boulevard Lévesque Est institution.

### Description
The rehabilitation project aims to repair the 2-04 basin, which is obsolete and requires elimination of the sources of infiltration in Laval, Quebec, Canada. This project has been mentioned in a previous bid solicitation (WS3974677031) dated May 15, 2023, which is canceled and superseded by this new solicitation.

### Instructions for Bidders
To access the full solicitation documentation, please refer to the following link: [https://disovery.ariba.com/rfx/17706389](https://disovery.ariba.com/rfx/17706389).

### Important Dates
- Closing Date: January 23, 2024 at 14:00 EDT
- Non-compliant bids will be declared automatically after this time.

### Request for Debriefing
A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who participated in the previous solicitation.

### Selection Criteria
The preference is for the lowest price.

### Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Information
- Contracting Entity: PSPC
- Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
- Contact: Samuel Pearson
- Email: [samuel.pearson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samuel.pearson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Compliance
This procurement complies with the CFTA.

### Region of Opportunity and Delivery Location
Laval, Quebec, Canada is both the region of opportunity and the delivery location for this project.
